question:
Match List I with List II and select the correct answer using the codes given below the Lists:
List I List II
(Writers) (Books)
I. Sashi Tharoor (A) Clear Light of Day
II. Amitav Ghosh (B) Circle of Reason
III. Anita Desai (C) Love and Longing in Bombay
IV. Vikram Chandra (D) Show Business
Codes:
explanation:
Shashi Tharoor is the writer of “Show Business
Amitabha Ghosh wrote “Circle of Reason”
Anita Desai wrote “Clear light of Day”
Vikram Chandra wrote” Love and longing in Bombay”.
